docs.lead_paragraph: The plum pudding must go. With it the pumpkin pie, the fragrant mince pie, and other time-honored Thanksgiving Day dainties must be discarded if the world is to be healthy as well as wealthy and wise.

headline.main: PLUM PUDDING MUST GO; Mrs. Hudders Would Also Rob Thanksgiving Day of Other Dainties. NO MORE FRAGRANT MINCE PIE The Sort of Thanksgiving Dinner She Would Serve -- Rules for Living on Other Days, Too.

docs.abstract: Dinner Menu Prepared by Mrs. Hudders and Others
docs.snippet: The plum pudding must go. With it the pumpkin pie, the fragrant mince pie, and other time-honored Thanksgiving Day dainties must be discarded if the world is to be healthy as well as wealthy and wise.
